comp.name: Scout Hull
comp.description: The scout hull, fitted out with everything a scout needs
comp.tpclRequirementsFunction: (lambda (design) (if (= (designType._num-components design) 1) (cons #t "") (cons #f "This is a complete component, nothing else can be included")))

comp.name: Battle Scout Hull
comp.description: The battle scout hull
comp.tpclRequirementsFunction: (lambda (design) (if (= (designType.num-hulls design) 1) (if (< (designType.num-baytypes design) 2) (cons #t "") (cons #f "A ship can only have one type of missile bay")) (cons #f "A ship can only use one hull!")))

comp.name: Advanced Battle Scout Hull
comp.description: The advanced battle scout hull, packing a bigger punch into a smaller and faster package
comp.tpclRequirementsFunction: (lambda (design) (if (= (designType.num-hulls design) 1) (if (< (designType.num-baytypes design) 2) (cons #t "") (cons #f "A ship can only have one type of missile bay")) (cons #f "A ship can only use one hull!")))

comp.name: Frigate
comp.description: The Frigate, a cheap ship that can easily destroy larger ships
comp.tpclRequirementsFunction: (lambda (design) (if (= (designType.num-hulls design) 1) (if (< (designType.num-baytypes design) 2) (cons #t "") (cons #f "A ship can only have one type of missile bay")) (cons #f "A ship can only use one hull!")))

comp.name: Battle Frigate
comp.description: The Battle Frigate, a slightly more powerful version of the frigate. High speed to firepower ratio.
comp.tpclRequirementsFunction: (lambda (design) (if (= (designType.num-hulls design) 1) (if (< (designType.num-baytypes design) 2) (cons #t "") (cons #f "A ship can only have one type of missile bay")) (cons #f "A ship can only use one hull!")))

comp.name: Destroyer
comp.description: The Destroyer, a main offensive threat of any fleet.
comp.tpclRequirementsFunction: (lambda (design) (if (= (designType.num-hulls design) 1) (if (< (designType.num-baytypes design) 2) (cons #t "") (cons #f "A ship can only have one type of missile bay")) (cons #f "A ship can only use one hull!")))

comp.name: Battle Destroyer
comp.description: The Battle Destroyer, a poor man's Battleship
comp.tpclRequirementsFunction: (lambda (design) (if (= (designType.num-hulls design) 1) (if (< (designType.num-baytypes design) 2) (cons #t "") (cons #f "A ship can only have one type of missile bay")) (cons #f "A ship can only use one hull!")))

comp.name: Battleship
comp.description: The Battleship, a ship that is hugely armored and armed.
comp.tpclRequirementsFunction: (lambda (design) (if (= (designType.num-hulls design) 1) (if (< (designType.num-baytypes design) 2) (cons #t "") (cons #f "A ship can only have one type of missile bay")) (cons #f "A ship can only use one hull!")))

comp.name: Dreadnought
comp.description: The dreadnought is the largest moveable ship available.
comp.tpclRequirementsFunction: (lambda (design) (if (= (designType.num-hulls design) 1) (if (< (designType.num-baytypes design) 2) (cons #t "") (cons #f "A ship can only have one type of missile bay")) (cons #f "A ship can only use one hull!")))

comp.name: Argonaut
comp.description: The argonaut is a huge ship that can't break orbit.
comp.tpclRequirementsFunction: (lambda (design) (if (= (designType.num-hulls design) 1) (if (< (designType.num-baytypes design) 2) (cons #t "") (cons #f "A ship can only have one type of missile bay")) (cons #f "A ship can only use one hull!")))

comp.name: Cerium 3 Explosives
comp.description: A huge but extremely explosive sub-nuclear particle
comp.tpclRequirementsFunction: (lambda (design) (if (= (designType.num-ammo design) 1) (cons #t "") (cons #f "This is a complete component, nothing else can be included")))

comp.name: Cerium 6 Explosives
comp.description: A huge but extremely explosive sub-nuclear particle
comp.tpclRequirementsFunction: (lambda (design) (if (= (designType.num-ammo design) 1) (cons #t "") (cons #f "This is a complete component, nothing else can be included")))

comp.name: Cerium 12 Explosives
comp.description: A huge but extremely explosive sub-nuclear particle
comp.tpclRequirementsFunction: (lambda (design) (if (= (designType.num-ammo design) 1) (cons #t "") (cons #f "This is a complete component, nothing else can be included")))

comp.name: Uranium Explosives
comp.description: Most basic nuclear explosive
comp.tpclRequirementsFunction: (lambda (design) (if (= (designType.num-ammo design) 1) (cons #t "") (cons #f "This is a complete component, nothing else can be included")))

comp.name: Antiparticle Explosives
comp.description: An extremely expensive but hugely explosive particle and anit-particle explosive
comp.tpclRequirementsFunction: (lambda (design) (if (= (designType.num-ammo design) 1) (cons #t "") (cons #f "This is a complete component, nothing else can be included")))

comp.name: Antimatter Explosives
comp.description: An even more extremely expensive but insanely explosive antimatter-matter explosive
comp.tpclRequirementsFunction: (lambda (design) (if (= (designType.num-ammo design) 1) (cons #t "") (cons #f "This is a complete component, nothing else can be included")))

comp.name: Thorium Explosives
comp.description: A significantly cheaper but less explosive nuclear explosive
comp.tpclRequirementsFunction: (lambda (design) (if (= (designType.num-ammo design) 1) (cons #t "") (cons #f "This is a complete component, nothing else can be included")))

comp.name: Alpha Missile Tube
comp.description: An alpha missile tube, capable of firing one alpha missile per combat round
comp.tpclRequirementsFunction: (lambda (design) (if (= (designType.num-ammo design) 1) (if (< (designType.AmmoSize design) 4) (cons #t "") (cons #f "Explosive is too large for alpha missiles")) (cons #f "Missiles can only handle one type of explosive")))

comp.name: Alpha Missile Rack
comp.description: An alpha missile rack, capable of holding 2 alpha missiles
comp.tpclRequirementsFunction: (lambda (design) (if (< (designType.num-ammo design) 3) (if (< (designType.AmmoSize design) 4) (cons #t "") (cons #f "Explosive is too large for alpha missiles")) (cons #f "Missiles can only handle one type of explosive")))

comp.name: Beta Missile Tube
comp.description: A beta missile tube, capable of firing one beta missile per combat round
comp.tpclRequirementsFunction: (lambda (design) (if (= (designType.num-ammo design) 1) (if (< (designType.AmmoSize design) 7) (cons #t "") (cons #f "Explosive is too large forbeta missiles")) (cons #f "Missiles can only handle one type of explosive")))

comp.name: Beta Missile Rack
comp.description: A beta missile rack, capable of holding 2 beta missiles
comp.tpclRequirementsFunction: (lambda (design) (if (< (designType.num-ammo design) 3) (if (< (designType.AmmoSize design) 7) (cons #t "") (cons #f "Explosive is too large for beta missiles")) (cons #f "Missiles can only handle one type of explosive")))

comp.name: Gamma Missile Tube
comp.description: A gamma missile tube, capable of firing one gamma missile per combat round
comp.tpclRequirementsFunction: (lambda (design) (if (= (designType.num-ammo design) 1) (if (< (designType.AmmoSize design) 9) (cons #t "") (cons #f "Explosive is too large forgamma missiles")) (cons #f "Missiles can only handle one type of explosive")))

comp.name: Gamma Missile Rack
comp.description: A gamma missile rack, capable of holding 2 gamma missiles
comp.tpclRequirementsFunction: (lambda (design) (if (< (designType.num-ammo design) 3) (if (< (designType.AmmoSize design) 9) (cons #t "") (cons #f "Explosive is too large for gamma missiles")) (cons #f "Missiles can only handle one type of explosive")))

comp.name: Delta Missile Tube
comp.description: A delta missile tube, capable of firing one delta missile per combat round
comp.tpclRequirementsFunction: (lambda (design) (if (= (designType.num-ammo design) 1) (if (< (designType.AmmoSize design) 13) (cons #t "") (cons #f "Explosive is too large for gamma missiles")) (cons #f "Missiles can only handle one type of explosive")))

comp.name: Delta Missile Rack
comp.description: A delta missile rack, capable of holding 2 delta missiles
comp.tpclRequirementsFunction: (lambda (design) (if (< (designType.num-ammo design) 3) (if (< (designType.AmmoSize design) 13) (cons #t "") (cons #f "Explosive is too large for delta missiles")) (cons #f "Missiles can only handle one type of explosive")))

comp.name: Epsilon Missile Tube
comp.description: An epsilon missile tube, capable of firing one epsilon missile per combat round
comp.tpclRequirementsFunction: (lambda (design) (if (= (designType.num-ammo design) 1) (if (< (designType.AmmoSize design) 25) (cons #t "") (cons #f "Explosive is too large for gamma missiles")) (cons #f "Missiles can only handle one type of explosive")))

comp.name: Epsilon Missile Rack
comp.description: An epsilon missile rack, capable of holding 2 epsilon missiles
comp.tpclRequirementsFunction: (lambda (design) (if (< (designType.num-ammo design) 3) (if (< (designType.AmmoSize design) 25) (cons #t "") (cons #f "Explosive is too large for epsilon missiles")) (cons #f "Missiles can only handle one type of explosive")))

comp.name: Omega Torpedoe Tube
comp.description: An omega torpedoe tube, capable of firing one omega torpedoe per combat round
comp.tpclRequirementsFunction: (lambda (design) (if (< (designType.AmmoSize design) 41) (cons #t "") (cons #f "Explosive is too large for omega torpedoes")) )

comp.name: Omega Torpedoe Rack
comp.description: An omega torpedoe rack, capable of holding 2 omega torpedoes
comp.tpclRequirementsFunction: (lambda (design) (if (< (designType.AmmoSize design) 41) (cons #t "") (cons #f "Explosive is too large for omega torpedoes")))

comp.name: Upsilon Torpedoe Tube
comp.description: An upsilon torpedoe tube, capable of firing one upsilon torpedoe per combat round
comp.tpclRequirementsFunction: (lambda (design) (if (< (designType.AmmoSize design) 61) (cons #t "") (cons #f "Explosive is too large for upsilon torpedoes")) )

comp.description: An upsilon torpedoe rack, capable of holding 2 upsilon torpedoes
comp.tpclRequirementsFunction: (lambda (design) (if (< (designType.AmmoSize design) 61) (cons #t "") (cons #f "Explosive is too large for upsilon torpedoes")))

comp.name: Tau Torpedoe Tube
comp.description: A tau torpedoe tube, capable of firing one tau torpedoe per combat round
comp.tpclRequirementsFunction: (lambda (design) (if (< (designType.AmmoSize design) 81) (cons #t "") (cons #f "Explosive is too large for tau torpedoes")) )

comp.description: A tau torpedoe rack, capable of holding 2 tau torpedoes
comp.tpclRequirementsFunction: (lambda (design) (if (< (designType.AmmoSize design) 81) (cons #t "") (cons #f "Explosive is too large for tau torpedoes")))

comp.description: A sigma torpedoe tube, capable of firing one sigma torpedoe per combat round
comp.tpclRequirementsFunction: (lambda (design) (if (< (designType.AmmoSize design) 111) (cons #t "") (cons #f "Explosive is too large for sigma torpedoes")) )

comp.description: A rho torpedoe tube, capable of firing one rho torpedoe per combat round
comp.tpclRequirementsFunction: (lambda (design) (if (< (designType.AmmoSize design) 151) (cons #t "") (cons #f "Explosive is too large for rho torpedoes")) )

comp.description: A rho torpedoe rack, capable of holding 2 rho torpedoes
comp.tpclRequirementsFunction: (lambda (design) (if (< (designType.AmmoSize design) 151) (cons #t "") (cons #f "Explosive is too large for rho torpedoes")))

comp.name: Xi Torpedoe Tube
comp.description: A xi torpedoe tube, capable of firing one xi torpedoe per combat round
comp.tpclRequirementsFunction: (lambda (design) (if (< (designType.AmmoSize design) 201) (cons #t "") (cons #f "Explosive is too large for xi torpedoes")) )

comp.description: A xi torpedoe rack, capable of holding 2 xi torpedoes
comp.tpclRequirementsFunction: (lambda (design) (if (< (designType.AmmoSize design) 201) (cons #t "") (cons #f "Explosive is too large for xi torpedoes")))

comp.name: Armor
comp.description: Armor reduces the damage taken by 0.1%
comp.tpclRequirementsFunction: (lambda (design) (if (= (designType._num-components design) 1) (cons #t "") (cons #f "This is a complete component, nothing else can be included")))

comp.name: Colonisation Module
comp.description: Allows the ship to colonise a planet.
comp.tpclRequirementsFunction: (lambda (design) (if (= (designType._num-components design) 1) (cons #t "") (cons #f "This is a complete component, nothing else can be included")))

prop.name: _num-components
prop.description: The total number of components in the design

prop.name: Speed
prop.description: The number of units the ship can move each turn

prop.name: AmmoCost
prop.description: The relative expensiveness of the explosive

prop.name: AmmoExplosiveness
prop.description: The explosiveness of a unit of the explosive used in the weapons of the ship
prop.tpclDisplayFunction: (lambda (design bits) (let ((n (apply + bits))) (cons n (string-append (number->string n) " hit points")) ) )

prop.name: AmmoSize
prop.description: The relative size of a unit of the explosive used in the weapons of the ship

prop.name: Firepower
prop.description: How much damage the weapons of the ship can do in a single round
prop.tpclDisplayFunction: (lambda (design bits) (let ((n (apply + bits))) (cons n (string-append (number->string n) " hit points")) ) )

prop.name: MissileCost
prop.description: The relative cost of a missile

prop.name: MissileFirepower
prop.description: How much damage a missile can do
prop.tpclDisplayFunction: (lambda (design bits) (let ((n (apply + bits))) (cons n (string-append (number->string n) " hit points")) ) )

prop.name: MissileSize
prop.description: The relative size of a missile

prop.name: TorpedoeCost
prop.description: The relative cost of a torpedoe

prop.name: TorpedoeFirepower
prop.description: How much damage a torpedoe can do
prop.tpclDisplayFunction: (lambda (design bits) (let ((n (apply + bits))) (cons n (string-append (number->string n) " hit points")) ) )

prop.name: TorpedoeSize
prop.description: The relative size of a torpedoe

prop.name: StartingHitPoints
prop.description: How much damage the ship can take before being destroyed
prop.tpclDisplayFunction: (lambda (design bits) (let ((n (apply + bits))) (cons n (string-append (number->string n) " hit points")) ) )

prop.name: BuildTime
prop.description: The number of turns to build this

prop.name: Armor
prop.description: The amount of armor on the ship

prop.name: HitPoints
prop.description: The number of HP this ship has

prop.name: Colonise
prop.description: Can the ship colonise planets

prop.name: num-ammo
prop.displayName: Number of missile and torpedo warhead types
prop.description: The number of missile and torpedo warhead types in the design
prop.tpclDisplayFunction: (lambda (design bits)(let ((n (apply + bits)))(cons n (string-append (number->string n) " explosive types"))))

prop.name: num-baytypes
prop.displayName: Number of missile or torpedo types
prop.description: The number of missile or torpedo types in the design

prop.name: num-hulls
prop.description: The number of hulls in the design

prop.name: Size
prop.description: The size of the ship in the design
